results.content: This is a pretty thin course compared to other Udemy courses. In addition, it really needs to be updated. It seems as if some fundamental aspects of Gulp have changed since this course was created.
results.content_html: This is a pretty thin course compared to other Udemy courses. In addition, it really needs to be updated. It seems as if some fundamental aspects of Gulp have changed since this course was created.

results.content: Instructor explains everything well and the projects were fun to build. I cant type as fast however I think I increased my speed a little trying to follow. #14 workshop I slowed down the play. I would recommend to anyone new to Gulp.
results.content_html: Instructor explains everything well and the projects were fun to build. I cant type as fast however I think I increased my speed a little trying to follow. #14 workshop I slowed down the play. I would recommend to anyone new to Gulp.

results.content: the course is great, engaging, clear, very good overall but would have love to see more example like mentionned at the end of the course Hope that will be added and will keep the course alive and built on excellent foundation. Deserve 5 stars.
results.content_html: the course is great, engaging, clear, very good overall but would have love to see more example like mentionned at the end of the course Hope that will be added and will keep the course alive and built on excellent foundation. Deserve 5 stars.

results.content: Seemed not to get going until section 3. Would also have liked coverage of configuration for debug/release, jslint, source-maps, cleaning folders, running tasks synchronously vs async, SASS and Compass. I learned enough to be able to follow some of these up on my own with the Gulp recipes on github. thanks very much for the course.
results.content_html: Seemed not to get going until section 3. Would also have liked coverage of configuration for debug/release, jslint, source-maps, cleaning folders, running tasks synchronously vs async, SASS and Compass. I learned enough to be able to follow some of these up on my own with the Gulp recipes on github. thanks very much for the course.

results.content: This course makes Gulp easy to understand. Starting with simple examples a workshop combines all plugins. The end level is not very high, so maybe you should consider an advanced Gulp course afterwards. If you just want to learn the basics, this will do.
results.content_html: This course makes Gulp easy to understand. Starting with simple examples a workshop combines all plugins. The end level is not very high, so maybe you should consider an advanced Gulp course afterwards. If you just want to learn the basics, this will do.

results.content:
The course is very good structured. It is worth to listen a lot of information about gulp before you install it. 

I learned a lot in this course and can recommend it.
results.content_html:

results.content:
Really good tutorial! Only negative for me: It would have been nice to see a bigger, more complex, enterprise level scenario however I do feel I have the know how to build this myself now.

Thanks!
results.content_html:

results.content: I think the course should have more examples that explain how can use gulp streams in real-world projects.

results.content: Even for experienced devs there may be a thing or two to pick up as there was for me.

results.content: very good for beginners! Great step by step tutorial!

results.content: I've heard of Gulp before, but never delved into it. Daniel provided a quick easy to follow course that shows how to quickly leverage this technology.
